mapper.select: select * from store_admin LEFT JOIN store_type on store_admin.storeTypeId = store_type.id LEFT JOIN category on store_admin.categoryId = category.id LEFT JOIN floor_plan on store_admin.floorId = floor_plan.id LEFT JOIN business_site on store_admin.doBusinessSiteId = business_site.id left join store_brand sb on store_admin.id = sb.storeId left join brand b on sb.brandId = b.id where store_admin.shopId= #{shopId} and store_type.type = #{storeType.type} and store_admin.status!=2
mapper.insert: insert into store_admin(shopId, name, categoryId, storeTypeId, doBusinessSiteId, floorId, introduce, logoImageUrl, status, keywords, storeMas) values(#{shopId}, #{name}, #{categoryId}, #{storeType.storeTypeId}, #{doBusinessSiteId}, #{floorId}, #{introduce},#{ logoImageUrl}, #{status}, #{keywords},#{ storeMas})
mapper.update: update store_admin set name = #{name}, categoryId =#{categoryId}, storeTypeId =#{storeTypeId}, doBusinessSiteId =#{doBusinessSiteId}, floorId =#{floorId}, introduce =#{introduce}, logoImageUrl =#{logoImageUrl}, status = #{status}, keywords=#{keywords}, storeMas = #{storeMas} where id = #{id}
